price: 106. Toen hun broeder Noah tegen hen zei: “Zullen jullie Allah niet vrezen en Hem gehoorzamen?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
